Line11.BAE4: Not the salve, no. But maybe it’s enough just to be at her side.
Line13.789BF: It is not enough for me.
Line15.BAE4: Then is all this really about her or you?
Line5.789BF: She showed me kindness when I was young. Not long ago, I finally found a way to repay that debt. A salve to cure her affliction.
Line7.789BF: But she refused it. Called me a fool for even trying to change her fate.
Line9.789BF: That was the last time I saw her. It is quite clear she does not want my help.
MenuLabel: “I meant no offense. I just want to know what happened.”
